question: Which city hosted the 11th National Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) Conference -2020?
explanation:
The Union Minister for Agriculture & Farmersâ€™ Welfare Narendra Singh Tomar recently inaugurated the 11th National Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) Conference -2020 in New Delhi.
The first KVK was established in 1974 at Puducherry under the administrative control of the Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, Coimbatore on a pilot basis. At present there are more than 700 KVKs across the country.
